Name: yarn production, jute | yarn, jute | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/13:Manufacture of textiles/131:Spinning, weaving and finishing of textiles/1311:Preparation and spinning of textile fibres
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3060/documentation

This dataset refers to the production of 1 kg yarn from jute fibre. The inventory includes softening, carding, drawing, and spinning of the raw jute. About 4% of raw jute converts into caddies and 6% of raw jute converts into jute dust. In most cases, byproducts/wastes are being reused in the same production process.;Hence, no wastes/by products are mentioned separately.

The activity starts with the opening of the raw jute fibre.

The activity ends with the produced greige yarn.
